learn_how_to_maximize_your_social_media_: Learn how to maximize your social media presence

referral_earn_message: Earn 100 Omni Coins each per referral!
discard_post_message: Discarding will permanently remove the generated post and the coins spent to create it.
discard_post_warning: If you discard now, everything you’ve created will be deleted.

scheduled_post_announcement: We'll soon be launching our Scheduled Post & Announcement feature – stay tuned for the official release!
referral_bonus_message: When someone buys a package using your referral link, you both earn 100 Buses Coins!
personalize_message: Tell us about yourself to personalize your experience
personal_information_message: Let's start with the basics — tell us a bit about yourself so we can personalize your experience.
brand_setup_message: Share a link to your public profile or website — OmniShare will use it to understand your brand and audience.
public_url_note: You can add a website, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Behance, YouTube, or any other public link.
target_audience_message: Based on your public profile, we'll suggest an audience — you can review or update it.
audience_location_example: e.g. UAE, Saudi Arabia, Germany, United Kingdom, Global
content_preferences_message: Tell us what kind of content you create and where you publish — OmniShare will optimize for those platforms.
goals_message: Why do you post on social platforms? This helps OmniShare personalize your content and recommendations.
update_password_message: Change your password to keep your account secure
create_schedule_publish: Create, schedule, and publish stunning content across Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, and TikTok - all from one powerful platform powered by AI.
suite_social_success: A Complete Suite for Social Success
omni_content_message: Leverage advanced AI technology to generate highly engaging posts tailored to your brand and each social media platform. Craft content that resonates, drives interaction, and amplifies your online presence effortlessly.
post_automation_message: Publish seamlessly across Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, and TikTok with a single click. OmniShare automatically generates AI-powered text and image posts, ensuring your content reaches every platform quickly and efficiently.
media_optimization_message: Automatically resize posts for each platform and create striking video thumbnails for YouTube uploads. All this happens within an intuitive editing suite, allowing fast, seamless customization so your content looks perfect every time.
smart_insights_message: Get clear, actionable insights on your content performance across all platforms. Track engagement and reach to make smarter decisions and continuously improve your social media strategy.
instant_publishing_message: Publish your content instantly with our lightning-fast, reliable system. Reach your audience at the right moment, every time, ensuring maximum engagement and impact.
react_trends: React to the trends that matter
react_trends_message: Access the world’s largest archive of consumer opinion and leverage advanced proprietary and generative AI to discover new trends before anyone else and make smarter decisions.
manage_channels_message: Monitor emerging threats across over 100m sources and set up smart, real-time alerts to respond with speed and confidence before problems develop.
see_action_message: Watch how easy it is to create and schedule content across all platforms
loved_creators_message: See what our customers have to say about Omnishare
faq_message: Everything you need to know about Omnishare
testimonial_1: Omnishare has completely transformed how we manage our social media presence. The AI-powered content generation saves us hours every week, and the multi-platform scheduling is seamless.
testimonial_2: "The analytics dashboard is incredibly powerful. We've seen a 300% increase in engagement since switching to Omnishare. The platform pays for itself within the first month."
testimonial_3: "As a solo creator managing multiple client accounts, Omnishare is a lifesaver. The AI understands each platform's nuances and creates perfectly optimized content every time."
testimonial_4: "Best investment we've made for our marketing stack. The time saved on content creation allows us to focus on strategy and growth. Highly recommend for any business."
testimonial_5: "The media optimization feature is fantastic. Our posts look professional across all platforms, and the scheduling ensures we post at optimal times for maximum reach."
create_publish_message: Yes! You can create one post and publish it across Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, and TikTok simultaneously, or schedule them at different optimal times for each platform.
ai_content_creation: How does OmniShare's AI-powered content creation work?
ai_content_creation_message: Our AI analyzes your brand voice, industry trends, and platform requirements to generate high-quality posts, captions, descriptions, and hashtags. You get ready-to-publish content tailored for each social platform.
platform_support: Which social media platforms does OmniShare support?
platform_support_message: You can manage Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, and TikTok — all through one centralized system.
multi_publish: Can I publish on multiple platforms at once?
multi_publish_message: Yes. With one click, OmniShare lets you publish your content across all connected platforms. The system also auto-generates AI text and images when needed.
insights: What kind of insights does OmniShare provide?
insights_message: You get clear, actionable analytics on engagement, reach, performance trends, and audience behavior — helping you make smarter decisions to improve your social strategy.
publishing_speed: How fast is OmniShare's publishing system?
publishing_speed_message: Our instant publishing engine ensures your posts go live immediately and reliably — so you can reach your audience at the perfect moment.
trend_content: Can OmniShare help with trend-based content?
trend_content_message: Yes! OmniShare scans real-time trends and transforms them into powerful captions, descriptions, and viral hashtags tailored to each platform.
business_suitability: Is OmniShare suitable for businesses and teams?
business_suitability_message: Definitely. OmniShare is built for individuals, agencies, brands, and teams managing content across different platforms, regions, or client accounts.
demos: Do you offer demos or product walkthroughs?
demos_message: Yes! You can explore the full potential of OmniShare with a personalized product demo to see how it can elevate your social growth.
still_questions: Still have questions? Scroll up to contact us.
contact_us_message: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
